Title: Azure Arc SQL LeastPrivilege Activation
Summary: This Jumpstart Drop provides a PowerShell Runbook that enables the LeastPrivilege FeatureFlag on Azure Arc SQL-enabled machines using Azure Resource Graph and Azure CLI.
Description: This Drop includes a PowerShell Runbook that enables the LeastPrivilege FeatureFlag on Azure Arc SQL-enabled machines. It uses managed identity, validates dependencies, installs the arcdata extension, queries Resource Graph, and applies the flag using Azure CLI.
